name: Bordeaux 2023 en primeur
description: 2023 is an exciting and, if you make your choices carefully, a very good vintage for red Bordeaux, as well as for whites and Sauternes. The best wines exhibit an attractive combination of ripe berry fruit and supple tannin coupled with elegance, freshness and outstanding smoothness.
